name: Kafka Connect Sink For Hazelcast
shortDescription: A Connector and Sink to write events from Kafka to Hazelcast. The connector takes the value from the Kafka Connect SinkRecords and inserts a new entry to a Hazelcast reliable topic.
longDescription: A Connector and Sink to write events from Kafka to Hazelcast. The connector takes the value from the Kafka Connect SinkRecords and inserts a new entry to a Hazelcast reliable topic.
